mapper.sql: serialNum, comId, qualificationNum, validityDate, qualificationName, qualificatioImage, delFlg, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime,remark
mapper.update: update companyQualification set delFlg =1 where comId = #{comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into companyQualification (serialNum, comId, qualificationNum, validityDate, qualificationName, qualificatioImage, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime, remark) values (#{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualificationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validityDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{qualificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualificatioImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into companyQualification (serialNum, comId, qualificationNum, validityDate, qualificationName, qualificatioImage, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime,remark) values
(#{item.serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qualificationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.validityDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.qualificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qualificatioImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select
from companyQualification where delFlg= 0 order by createTime DESC
select count(*) from companyQualification where delFlg= 0
mapper.update:
update companyQualification
serialNum = #{item.serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comId = #{comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qualificationNum = #{qualificationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
validityDate = #{validityDate,jdbcType=DATE},
qualificationName = #{qualificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qualificatioImage = #{qualificatioImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delFlg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where serialNum = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update.foreach:
update companyQualification
serialNum = #{item.serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comId = #{item.comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qualificationNum = #{item.qualificationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
validityDate = #{item.validityDate,jdbcType=DATE},

createTime = #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

updateTime = #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
